p: Table 6 shows unadjusted and adjusted associations between SRP equity and sexual behaviour and relationship outcomes. Higher SRP equity was not associated with condom use at last sex with primary partner for either young men or young women. For young women, higher SRP equity scores was associated with reduced likelihood of experiencing IPV in the last 6 months, however SRP equity did not show an association with young menâ€™s reported perpetration of IPV in the last 6 months.
